name: twitBook
description:
Game made for the Freelives 2016 Game Jam that took place in South Africa. The game uses both a xbox controller and a Leap Motion. twitBook is a coop shooter in which players control a human wielding bird which has set out to censor and destroy the players opposing views which are running rampant in the twitVerse.

The team had 72 hours to make the game but alas life happened and the team could only use the last day and a half. Hope everyone enjoys the game and looking forward to what people have to say.
